sentences.en: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.cn: 大火过后, 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存.

sentences.en: At 54 years old her energy and looks are magnificent.
sentences.cn: 她54岁了，精力和气色都非常好。

sentences.en: He had a magnificent head of silvered hair.
History relates that they stumbled on a magnificent waterfall.
sentences.cn: 历史上记载他们曾意外地发现了一处壮观的瀑布。

sentences.en: It is indeed the most magnificent drawing - room I have ever seen.
sentences.cn: 那的确是我所见到的最豪华的客厅.

sentences.en: It's going to be the most magnificent Thanksgiving dinner we ever had.
sentences.cn: 这将是我们参加过的最盛大的感恩节晚餐。

sentences.en: Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentences.cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentences.en: Several magnificent oil paintings adorn the walls.
sentences.cn: 几幅恢宏的油画装点着墙面。

sentences.en: She looked magnificent in a long red dress.
sentences.cn: 她穿着红色长裙，看起来美极了。

sentences.en: She watched the magnificent waterfall cascade down the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 她看着壮观的瀑布从山坡上倾泻而下.

sentences.en: The flowers were colourful and the scenery magnificent.
sentences.cn: 花儿五颜六色，景色蔚为壮观。

sentences.en: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.cn: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.en: The results are nothing short of magnificent.
The Taj Mahal is a magnificent building.
sentences.cn: 泰姬陵是一座宏伟的建筑。

sentences.en: The twelve-mile coastline has magnificent sce-nery.
sentences.cn: 这12英里的海岸线景色壮观。

sentences.en: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.cn: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧.

sentences.en: This magnificent church cannot fail to stop you in your tracks.
sentences.cn: 这座宏伟的教堂一定会让你止步赞叹。

trans.tran_cn: 壮丽的，宏伟的，值得赞扬的
trans.tran_en: very good or beautiful, and very impressive
